name: N M
text: No mask, no business. I cannot believe medical professionals go without masks when Alabama hospitals have requested that everyone continue to wear them. By your responses, you don't seem to care. Good luck.

name: Paul Sherling
text: Excellent Service!  Each employee treats you like family that you don’t get from chain drug stores and other pharmacies.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr. Sherling for the kind words. Our staff tries so hard to make everyone feel welcome and appreciated. Have a great day!

name: mario vantez
text: Not a single pharmacist or employee wearing a mask. Please respect the safety of your customers in the future.

resp.text: While I do respect your ability to have an opinion on the wearing of masks, context certainly does get lost when our intent is to lecture someone instead of attempting to solve a problem no matter if it is real or perceived.  We strive to make ALL patients and employees comfortable but we also respect their personal decisions.  I do not feel as though immediately taking comments to the internet instead of addressing your concerns in a personal manner is necessary nor is this the appropriate forum for the airing of grievances.  You, Sir, have a wonderful day!  John N. Holley

name: Julie Schnabel
text: Left a text message because I was having problems with there phone returned my call within minutes and they weren’t even open.. I had forgotten about time difference.. Staff has always been friendly and helpful on the phone Customer Service is A#1 Thanks.

resp.text: Thank you Ms Julie and have a great day!

name: SuperSteve English
text: Love Holley. Good people & a pleasure to go into.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words.

name: Steve Milton
text: S'where I git muh crack at, Joe Rogan! *scratchin my neck*

resp.text: Mr. Milton, Thank you so much for the 5 star review but I don't quite understand the crack reference since that is an illegal substance and this is a licensed pharmacy. We obviously do not have that in stock and I'm pretty sure that we can't even order it! I am familiar with the celebrity Joe Rogan, however. I do hope that your neck will stop itching since you scratched it. Have a great day!

name: Dr Mike
text: John and the staff are AWESOME!!!!

resp.text: You are too kind. Thank you so much!

name: Ricky Nickolson
text: I started using Holley Pharmacy in Enterprise shortly after it first opened in our city. The "home town" service just cannot be matched by the big box chain pharmacies! As a customer, it is nice to feel welcomed and appreciated in a place of business, rather than feeling like an intrusion.

name: Lisa Harrison
text: I appericate the patience and the kindness they show. They genuinely care...

resp.text: Thank you so much for recognizing our team's effort and it truly is about the patient. Please let us know how we can help!

name: Diane Gabert
text: They stayed open late for me to fill my prescription after exiting the hospital. I have found my new pharmacy.
